laboratory_examinations.findings: Positive in serum, negative in nasopharyngeal sample; serum antibody titer was 1:3200.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Subsequent samples showed positive rRT-PCR in sputum on April 30 (DOI 13) and oropharyngeal swab on May 1 (DOI 14); viral load in sputum on DOI 13 was 5.31 x 10^6 copies/ml, decreased to 1.26 x 10^5 copies/ml on DOI 16.

laboratory_examinations.findings: WBC 7.01 x 10^9/L, Lymphocytes 0.81 x 10^9/L (low), Hemoglobin 13.2 g/dL, Platelets 224,000.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Total lymphocyte count remained low throughout hospitalization, with a nadir of 0.69 x 10^9/L and a discharge value of 1.44 x 10^9/L.

laboratory_examinations.findings: ALT 80 U/L (high), AST 95 U/L (high), Alkaline Phosphatase 270 U/L (high).
ESR 44 mm/h (high), C-reactive Protein 10 mg/dL (high), Procalcitonin 0.54 mg/dL (high).
